text: The following is a list of current presidents of the regional councils of France and the Corsican Assembly. ==List== Region President Affiliation In office since Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Laurent Wauquiez The Republicans 4 January 2016 Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Marie-Guite Dufay Socialist Party 4 January 2016 Brittany Loïg Chesnais-Girard Socialist Party 22 June 2017 Centre-Val de Loire François Bonneau Socialist Party 7 September 2007 Corsica Marie-Antoinette Maupertuis Femu a Corsica 1 July 2021 Guadeloupe Ary Chalus United Guadeloupe, Solidary and Responsible 18 December 2015 French Guiana Gabriel Serville Miscellaneous left 1 July 2021 Grand Est Jean Rottner The Republicans 20 October 2017 Île-de-France Valérie Pécresse The Republicans 18 December 2015 Occitanie Carole Delga Socialist Party 4 January 2016 Martinique Claude Lise Martinican Democratic Rally 18 December 2015 Mayotte Soibahadine Ibrahim Ramadani The Republicans 2 April 2015 Hauts-de-France Xavier Bertrand The Republicans 4 January 2016 Normandy Hervé Morin The Centrists 4 January 2016 Nouvelle-Aquitaine Alain Rousset Socialist Party 4 January 2016 Pays de la Loire Christelle Morançais The Republicans 19 October 2017 Provence-Alpes-Côte d’Azur Renaud Muselier The Republicans 15 May 2017 Réunion Huguette Bello Miscellaneous left 1 July 2021 ==Other websites== * Rulers.org * Worldstatesmen.org
title: President of the Regional Council (France)
